channel.title: Random Item Command? [PI]
channel.description: I need to make a command that spawns a random item from ID's 1-20000 on Project Insanity Source. Any Ideas on how to do this? I actually modified a casket system to give a random item when clicked from 1-18000, but when I compiled it said "code too large" because I actually listed all item Id's from 1-18000. There has to be a simpler way to do this.

item.title: Random Item Command? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @bob_2 bob 2
item.description:
@bob_2 wrote:

I need to make a command that spawns a random item from ID’s 1-20000 on Project Insanity Source. Any Ideas on how to do this? I actually modified a casket system to give a random item when clicked from 1-18000, but when I compiled it said “code too large” because I actually listed all item Id’s from 1-18000. There has to be a simpler way to do this.

Read full topic
